# File lib/webrat/core/configuration.rb, line 87
    def mode=(mode)
      @mode = mode.to_sym

      # This is a temporary hack to support backwards compatibility
      # with Merb 1.0.8 until it's updated to use the new Webrat.configure
      # syntax
      if @mode == :merb
        require("webrat/merb_adapter")
      else
        require("webrat/#{mode}")
      end
    end
